item.title: Entire pavement outside of school grounds, 27th October
item.description:
There is shrubs and leaves, dirt and mud covering the entire pavement along the school grounds. Road needs sweeping. There is also a drainage problem which could be down to the shrubs, leaves, rubbish and dirt clogging up the drains, as whenever it rains even slightly - the entire road has pools of water and could lead to flooding, this is all along the side of the road that the school is on.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Christchurch Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road works signage left on footpath, 27th October
item.description:
I do a lot of walking in Orpington and all the time and finding where roadworks have been. The signage has just been left either in the bushes or like this on the footpath can this be cleared? Can we remind contractors that they must take all their signage with them to keep our borough Safe and tidy?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant fly tipping by the clothes bank, 27th October
item.description:
Clothes and 8x bin bags left on the side of Tavistock Close - attracts vermin. Constantly happening, could the clothes bin be removed and planters implemented to stop this being a dumping ground?!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crossway, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped plastic hazard barrier at entrance to alleyway between 17 and 19 Birchwood Road Petts Wood, 27th October
item.description:
A plastic hazard barrier was left in Birchwood Road Petts Wood during the morning of Friday, 17 October by two men who laid a new paving stone outside 12 Birchwood Road. They drove off after moving the barrier close to the wall and it has been there or thereabouts ever since.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birchwood Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
